frontmatter.title: 2022 was a great year for GitOps
Why you need a Managed Detection & Response service
frontmatter.description: Businesses today operate in a highly dynamic and fast-paced environment, where technology plays a vital role in driving growth and success. However, this also means that businesses are increasingly vulnerable to cyber attacks and data breaches, which can have serious consequences, including financial losses, damage to reputation, and loss of customer trust.
